question: To make a call from a {dev}, you must pay {currency}{frac1} for each minute of your call. After {t} minutes, the price drops to {currency}{frac2} per minute. After {t2} minutes from the start of the call, the price drops even more to {currency}{frac3} per two minutes. If your total bill is more than {currency}{limit}, you get a {disc}% discount on your total bill. How much would a {total}-minute call cost?
